content.data:
Clicking NC Code & Labels brings up the 
 Output Data window. Simply select which data you would like to output. 
 The Output Tasks area will be categorized by each active Machine Set you 
 are outputting to. Each Category has three main areas:

Manual  - The Create 
	 Output option can be turned off to not Output Codes for the Saw.. 
 Save Job State -  
	 There are three options for the Save Job State category: 
 
 Create Output File - 
		 Will create an SNC file of the current Job at it's "Ready 
		 for Output" state. 
 SNC File Name - Specifies 
		 the file name for your Job State file. 
 SNC Output Path - Specifies 
		 the folder to Save the Job State file to.

Manual  - The Create 
	 Output option can be turned off to not Output Codes for the Saw..
